title: Bone Dance
description: Alexandra is shocked to learn that the father she never knew has died and left her a cabin in rural Manitoba. She knows she must visit the cabin even while she grieves for her unknown father. There she meets Lonny, a boy also tom by grief and visions he can't shake. His family once owned the land Alex has inherited. But Lonny rejected it, never dreaming it would go to Alex. Lonny and Alex are haunted by pasts they cannot change. Now, guiding spirits of their Native Canadian ancestors have brought them together to face their futures.
author: Martha Brooks
